Package de.oth.blocklib.shaders

Classes to load shader.
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Shader  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AdditiveLightShader
    Shader to apply additional light sources besides the DayNightLighting to an object
    AnimatedShader
    Shader to render animated objects
    BaseShader
    Default ShaderProgram to render most objects with
    BillboardShader
    ShaderProgram for displaying a Billboard object.
    DebugGridShader  
    DeferredLightShader
    Shader for deferred Lights.
    DeferredShader
    Shader to render Objects in the Deferred Rendering pipeline
    FluidShader
    Shader for fluids
    GBufferShader
    Shader to help visualize G-Buffers.
    GlobalUniforms  
    GUIShader
    ShaderProgram to render GUI elements
    HeightMapShader
    ShaderProgram that is responsible for rendering a HeightMap, which is used in the PrecipitationShader to make sure Particles don't fall beneath the ground.
    LineShader
    ShaderProgram used by Line.
    OverlayShader
    ShaderProgram to render GUI elements
    ScrollTextureShader  
    ShaderInitializer  
    ShaderProgram
    Abstract base class for all shader programs, used to render objects.
    SpecularShader
    ShaderProgram for complex shading.
    SpriteSheetShader
    Shader for objects using sprite sheet animations
    StaticShader
    ShaderProgram to render Chunks with.
    TransparentShader
    ShaderProgram for transparent objects.
